newsitem.title: USA: Leslie Fay amends reorganization plan.
newsitem.headline: Leslie Fay amends reorganization plan.

text.p: The Leslie Fay Companies Inc said on Monday it and its official committee of unsecured creditors have filed an amended joint plan of reorganization with the U.S. Bankruptcy Court.

The new plan sorted out many smaller details about the company's structure, compensation, financing and governance, a company spokesman said. These areas had been the subject of prolonged discussions, he said.
The company, which had filed for reorganization last November, said it also filed a revised disclosure statement.

As previously announced, Leslie Fay planned to emerge from bankruptcy by separating its Sassco Fashions business from its core Leslie Fay business. If this plan happens, Leslie Fay's current equity would be extinguished, the company said.
